tests.name: firstName
tests.run: npm test -- --ci --runInBand -t "firstName variable exists and is non-empty"

tests.name: lastName
tests.run: npm test -- --ci --runInBand -t "lastName variable exists and is non-empty"

tests.name: age
tests.run: npm test -- --ci --runInBand -t "age is a number (declared with let in student code)"

tests.name: fullName
tests.run: npm test -- --ci --runInBand -t "fullName combines firstName and lastName"

tests.name: greeting
tests.run: npm test -- --ci --runInBand -t "prints a greeting to the console"
